mapper.select: select no, name, to_char(writeday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS writeday from spring_exam

select commuteNo, FK_employeeNo, nvl(to_char(startTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '-') as startTime, nvl(to_char(endTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '-') as endTime, status, rest, overTimeYN from tbl_commute where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_commute(commuteNo, FK_employeeNo, startTime, status, rest, overTimeYN) values(commuteSeq.nextval, #{fk_employeeNo}, sysdate, 2, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update tbl_commute set startTime = sysdate, status = 2 where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
update tbl_commute set endTime = sysdate, status = 6 where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
update tbl_commute set status = #{status} where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
mapper.select: select to_char( nvl( round(endTime - startTime , 8), 0) ) as workTime from tbl_commute where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and startTime BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw') and TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')+6.99999
